dsOverview.title: University of Arizona Tree Ring Data

summary.p: One hundred tree ring chronologies were provided by the University of Arizona. The individual chronology lengths vary widely, with the longest one extending from year 1 to 1972. Chronologies generally end in the late 1960s or early 1970s.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UAZ/LTRR > Laboratory of Tree-Ring Research, University of Arizona

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Paleoclimate > Land Records > Tree Rings
dsOverview.relatedResource: International Tree Ring Data Bank (ITRDB) at NOAA Paleoclimatology
